header.services2: import of goods from the EU

home.title: Seamless European Imports – Full-Service Logistics from Supplier to Destination
home.description: A full-cycle logistics service: import, export, customs clearance, and financial management. Guaranteed quality, competitive rates, and on-time delivery.

reasons.reason2: We sell a wide range of goods from European manufacturers with a high professional reputation and at competitive prices.
reasons.reason3: Being a professional supplier, we independently organize commodity, financial, customs and transport logistics. With 10-year partnerships we offer special prices for the supply of goods from the countries of the European Union. Traditionally, our customers are importers and companies from Azerbaijan, China, India, Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan.
reasons.reason6: We efficiently manage global deliveries, optimizing routes and reducing costs.
reasons.reason9: We collaborate with trusted suppliers, ensuring high quality and competitive pricing.
reasons.reason11: to make quality products from the best world manufacturers available to more people.

services.service2: Our company offers tailored logistics solutions to ensure efficient and cost-effective delivery of goods across key international markets. From Europe to Asia, we handle import, transportation, customs clearance, and risk management, providing our clients with full-service logistics support.
services.service4: We provide a seamless import solution for businesses in Azerbaijan, ensuring cost-effective and hassle-free deliveries. Our service includes obtaining necessary permits, organizing optimal transportation, customs clearance, and tax payments. We also handle transport risks and initial goods inspections. Additional services like certification, insurance, and quality control are available to ensure smooth and secure imports.
services.service6: We transport goods from the EU to China, India, Uzbekistan, and Kazakhstan, ideal for small-scale shipments or first-time importers. Our service covers procurement, transit via Turkey, customs clearance, and tax payments. We also manage transport risks, inspections, certification, insurance, and quality control for secure and compliant deliveries.
services.service8: We facilitate shipments from Turkey to Turkmenistan, Uzbekistan, and Kazakhstan, ideal for small-scale or first-time deliveries. Our service covers purchasing under our contract, customs documentation, and optimized transportation under DAP terms. We handle transport risks, conduct inspections, and offer optional insurance and quality control.
services.service9: Development of an individual logistics solution
services.service10: Ideal for small and medium-sized businesses in China, India, Uzbekistan, Turkmenistan, and Kazakhstan seeking cost-effective, high-quality logistics. We provide end-to-end support, including consultation, financial logistics, certification assistance, warehousing, and multimodal transport. Clients benefit from up to 15% cost savings and optimized transportation solutions.

homeDirection.title: Our directions
homeDirection.text: We specialize in international logistics and turnkey delivery solutions, providing reliable and cost-effective transportation services across multiple regions.

contacts.title: Your First Step to Collaboration
contacts.text: We are always ready to answer your questions and provide detailed information about our services. Contact us, and we will help you find the best solutions for your needs, explain our work processes, and provide all the necessary details for collaboration.
contacts.name: Name

hero.title: Import of goods to Azerbaijan
hero.text: We provide a seamless import solution for businesses in Azerbaijan, ensuring cost-effective and hassle-free deliveries.

service1.text: We import goods to Azerbaijan under our contract

service3.text: We organize optimal transportation of goods

service5.text: Selling goods to buyers in Azerbaijan at a set price

service6.text: Payment of customs duties and taxes.

item1.text: Units and entities from Azerbaijan with a small volume of deliveries, from 2-3 pallets / 1 transport unit (car / container) per month or less.

item2.text: For importers of goods for which customs often adjusts the customs value.

item3.text: For companies intending to import goods for the first time.

value.title: How we add value to your business

item1.title: Cost optimization
item1.text: Economic benefit from 15% of the cost of the batch.

item2.title: Seamless Customs Processing
item2.text: Benefit from delievering work with customs and the risks of adjusting the customs value.

item3.title: Quality Control at Loading
item3.text: Our representatives will perform the initial inspection of the goods when loading them into the vehicle.

item4.title: We Cover Transport Risks
item4.text: Transport risks are also passed to us.

hero.title: Goods delivery from EU countries
hero.text: Efficient delivery solutions from the European Union to China, India, Uzbekistan, and Kazakhstan. We handle procurement, logistics, customs, and transit through Turkey—minimizing risks and reducing costs by up to 10%.

service1.text: We purchase goods in EU countries under our contract

service4.text: Payment of customs duties and taxes in Turkey

service2.text: We optimize goods transport via Turkish terminals

service5.text: Transportation of goods under DAP terms

service3.text: We facilitate transit sales in Turkey with full documentation

item1.text: For units and entities from China, India, Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan, with a small volume of deliveries, from 1-2 pallets / 1 transport unit (car/container) per month or less.

item2.text: For companies are ongoing to trade with EU countries and are planning to make their first delivery.

service4.text: Transportation of goods under DAP terms

item2.text: For companies are ongoing to trade with Turkiye countries and are planning to make their first delivery.

hero.text: Comprehensive supply chain support, including consultation, financial logistics, customs clearance, certification, and multimodal transportation. Reduce import costs by up to 15% and optimize shipments without the need for in-house logistics staff.

ourDirections.title: Our directions
ourDirections.text: We specialize in international logistics and turnkey delivery solutions, providing reliable and cost-effective transportation services across multiple regions.
ourDirections.subtitle: We sell a wide range of goods from European manufacturers with a high professional reputation and at competitive prices.
ourDirections.text2: Being a professional supplier, we independently organize commodity, financial, customs and transport logistics. With 10-year partnerships we offer special prices for the supply of goods from the countries of the European Union. Traditionally, our customers are importers and companies from Azerbaijan, China, India, Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan.

item1.text1: The following services will be beneficial for customers from Azerbaijan:
item1.text2: Turkey delivery of goods from the European Union
item1.text3: Turkey delivery of goods from China and India
item1.text4: Turkey delivery of goods from Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan
item1.subtitle2: To order the service, call by phone

item2.text1: We have been working with manufacturers from the European Union for over 10 years. We have a wide distribution network, regular deliveries, wholesale discounts, and well-established transport logistics for deliveries to the following countries:
item2.subtitle2: To order the service, call by phone

item3.text1: We have been working with Turkish manufacturers for over 7 years. We have a wide network of partners, regular deliveries, wholesale discounts, and well-established transport logistics for deliveries to the following countries:
